title: The Watch Vods page....

embed.description: Feed your competitive spirit as we bring you the best that professional League of Legends has to offer.

body:
Now, it might be just me.... but having the advancement games shown, and then having "possible spoilers, click to reveal" on the tiebreaker games, is more than a little bit redundant. It's all been spoiled by showing the knockout games anyway!!!!!

Seriously wish people would think before they do stuff.
